item.description:
Welcome to Wet Your Whistle Wednesday! (WYWW).

Same idea as previous 'Thirsty First Thursdays' (i.e. no special agenda, just come along to meet some fun people, have a chat and a drink) but shifted by a day.

The 21st Amendment is a good ol' fashioned pub - good beer, good pub food, bang next to thee golden dome of the State House. You never know, Governor Patrick may pop in for a pint.

Easiest way to get there is red line / green line T to Park Street and walk uphill through / around the common (Govt Center is also pretty close).

Should be a good laugh, see you there.
Cheers, KC
cell 617-372-3664

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Wet your Whistle Wednesday - 21st Amendment
